org.apache.juneau.dto.html5

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.dto.html5.HtmlElement
      • org.apache.juneau.dto.html5.HtmlElementVoid
        • org.apache.juneau.dto.html5.Input

  • @Bean(typeName="input")
public class Input
extends HtmlElementVoid
    DTO for an HTML <input> element.
